summary: This document is an email chain from November 2, 2020, between FBI personnel coordinating outreach to a victim of Jeffrey Epstein who resides in an unspecified location. The purpose is to invite the victim to a DOJ meeting scheduled for November 12, 2020. It demonstrates ongoing victim coordination efforts by the FBI and DOJ following Epstein's case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; the case involves his victims.

events.title: DOJ Meeting for Epstein Victim
events.description: A Department of Justice meeting scheduled to which an Epstein victim is to be invited.

keyFacts: FBI personnel are actively coordinating in November 2020 to contact a victim of Jeffrey Epstein.
The purpose is to invite the victim to a DOJ meeting scheduled for November 12, 2020.
The document indicates ongoing victim outreach and coordination efforts by the FBI and DOJ post-Epstein.
The location of the victim is redacted in the text.
